Tm_range_min.description: Minimum allowable melting temperature in C

Tm_range_max.description: Maximum allowable melting temperature in C

length_min.description: Minimum length of the desired primer

length_max.description: Maximum length of the desired primer

terminate_gc.description: Whether to have a GC clamp at both ends of the primer (0 = false, 1 = true)

center_mutation.description: Whether to center the mutation in the primer (0 = false, 1 = true)

primer_mode.description: Whether to design overlapping or complementary primers.

expression_system.description: File name of the expression system to use. File must be located inside the `expression system` folder.
